title: How to tell someone that their husband has passed away - Quora

response.answer_text: You should tell them immediately, within hours of knowledge. Explain what happened, be very sensitive. If they’re in public, tell them that you are going to tell them something and wait for them to get to a more private place. Then, when that person is in a private place, tell her that “X just passed away.” And explain what happened. Make sure you be sensitive in explainng what happened. Be very respectful and if you’re with the deceased, explain what the doctor said, etc.
